merpi_desc: %USER's tongue. Whatever length it is this wet muscle spends most of its time in a mouth. Theirs, yours, someones.

merpi_normal: %USER's tongue is trying to lick the life out of %TARGET's %T_PART!!
merpi_flowery: %USER's is dragging their tongue across %TARGET's %T_PART like they are trying to speed run a tootsie pop!!
%USER sticks their tongue out and gently runs it across %TARGET's %T_PART.
%USER sticks their tongue out cutely before dragging it across %TARGET's %T_PART like a greedy creature!

merpi_normal: %USER laps at %TARGET's %T_PART, leaving behind a little bit of drool.
merpi_flowery: %USER mlems, sticking their tongue out before dragging slowly across %TARGET's %T_PART and leaving behind a thin layer of their drool!

merpi_normal: %USER slurps at %TARGET's %T_PART, clearly chasing after a taste of some sort!
merpi_flowery: %USER sticks their tongue out and pushes it at %TARGET's %T_PART, clearly they've got a taste for something it has and are trying to get all of it!

merpi_normal: %USER mlems at %TARGET's %T_PART heavily, coating it with %THIER spit.
merpi_flowery: %USER flops their tongue out fully and slowly drags it across %TARGET's %T_PART, leaving behind a heavy coating of their drool!

merpi_normal: %USER suckles at %TARGET's %T_PART, clearly swallowing something as they do so!
merpi_flowery: %USER has sealed %TARGET's %T_PART into their mouth and is lapping at it greedily, swallowing either something it's giving them or their own excess saliva!
merpi_repeat: %USER suckles %TARGET's %T_PART, swallowing anything that comes out!

merpi_normal: %USER drags their tongue across %TARGET's %T_PART a bit too hard!
merpi_flowery: %USER presses %TARGET's %T_PART to their tongue a bit too hard, dragging it across the wet appendage roughly!

merpi_normal: %USER uses their tongue to milk %TARGET's %T_PART for every ounce of whatever its offering!
merpi_flowery: %USER is absolutely suckling in full tilt from %TARGET's %T_PART, milking it with their oral attention and swallowing anything it gives them!
